thread.title: Great stay. Comfortable hotel with a good atmosphere
thread.title_full: Great stay. Comfortable hotel with a good atmosphere - Review of La Maison Favart, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Martin W
title: Great stay. Comfortable hotel with a good atmosphere
text:
Perfect location in the opera district and within easy reach of Gard du Nord.
I agree with all the other reviews. Great decor, impeccably clean, fantastic service, excellent breakfast, comfortable and cosy rooms with good bathroom and excellent water pressure on the shower.
I actually stayed on business but it's more of a leisure hotel and would be perfect for a weekend stay in Paris with friends, relatives or partners. That said, I'm going to stay here again when I go back to Paris and wouldn't hesitate to stay her for leisure.
Deserves the high praise.
